requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-4000M
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 4000 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and mouse are needed.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-9300H
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and mouse are needed.
